fields.name: Trigger Variable
fields.description: The local variable number that triggers or activates this actor.

fields.name: Shaking and Transition Effect
fields.description: The effect and transition associated with the magic circle.

1.name: Slight Shaking, Pixelation, Music Distortion
1.description: Slight shaking with pixelation transition and music distortion.

fields.name: Arrival X Coordinate
fields.description: The X coordinate where players arrive after the warp.

fields.name: Arrival Y Coordinate
fields.description: The Y coordinate where players arrive after the warp.

fields.name: Magic Circle Type
fields.description: The type of magic circle effect.

8.name: Glitter Effect
8.description: Magic circle has a glitter effect.

16.name: Disappears After All Players Use
16.description: The magic circle disappears after all players have used it.
